Ciao a tutti👋

I'm Domenico Vito Scalera and I'm a software engineer passionate about technology and startups.

I enjoy passing on my passion to the new generation as a computer science teacher and grow my interests by working for @Voltaage and @sport Analytics.

I am a people person, I enjoy meeting people with different cultures and different points of view through travel or working in international environments.

九成的時間注意力無法集中、記憶力差，只是個面臨長照壓力的疲勞中年人，請不要在轉貼我有興趣的內容下跟我發表你的政治高見，每天要看的資訊已經夠多了，沒興趣開研討會，謝謝。

不歡迎天朝子民（認為「台灣是中國的一部分」的人）來這說三道四，不尊重這點宣告還要來留言「指教」的天朝子民一律封鎖。

發嘟不是為了找人聊天或同仇敵愾／沒追求當公知丶KOL，嘟文沒鎖也有表明不想受干擾的自由／KY & mansplain 別怪我不客氣／我mur我的偏見，有什麼想法請自己回去寫嘟批判（截圖無妨也不用通知我，我沒興趣知道）／流水帳&大量政治推剪貼筆記／從這轉嘟之前請自行查證／轉貼不一定是同意其內容的意思／

מה בלגי בעינך?

חברת התחב״צ של בריסל STIB/MIVB (תלוי בשפה) עורכת סקר שביעות רצון שנתי, ביחד עם חברת הסקרים Ipsos. אחת התשובות לשאלה ״איזה סוג כרטיס את/ה רוכש/ת בדרך כלל״ היא ״בדרך כלל אני נוסע/ת בלי לרכוש כרטיס״.

content:
Man In The High Tower
© Surazeus
2022 11 22

Too early in the morning to recall
why civilizations always collapse,
I drink ginger mocha at frosted glass
to watch people riding the bus to work
where they work for the man in the high tower
who calculates worth of the holy flower.

Whole Poem:
https://ello.co/surazeus/post/gt88zhz3mculupj5vcxlug

content:
Yesterday, I showed my granddaughter how much fun it is to play with the translator program Google.

It's like the telephone game on steroids.

Go through a half dozen translations of something wildly improbable and ridiculous, and it comes out hilariously wrong. I did discover that either I chose phrases that translated well initially or their program has improved a LOT because the first paragraphs I wrote came out right no matter how many languages it went through.

media_attachments.description:
Headspace Basil from Omori holding a camera. He has a scared expression on his face
 Red light is coming from the flash of his camera. The corners of the piece are filled with dripping eyes. There is text on the image of Basil saying "Huh? I didn't take this photo M-Mari? Sh-she's"

There are a pair of white hands at the bottom of the image. They are crossed to resemble a white egret orchid. There's also white egret orchids in the background. There is text in the top left corner that says "My thoughts will follow you into your dreams."

content:
Timothy Garton Ash: "Pro některé politiky je svůdné s národními populisty spolupracovat. Chtějí s jejich pomocí získat moc, a tak s nimi uzavřou koalici tak jako v Itálii nebo vyjednají parlamentní podporu tak jako ve Švédsku. Já naopak souhlasím s přístupem německých demokratických stran, které kolem tamní AfD vytvořily bariéru a jednoznačně s ní odmítají spolupracovat. Je důležité řešit motivy jejich voličů, ale nikoli s populistickými politiky „jít do postele“."

https://www.respekt.cz/tydenik/2022/47/zapad-v-roce-2014-minul-bod-obratu?gift=lgnblitngu

Hello! I’ve been helping people use DNA to explore their roots for over 20 years. 🧬🔍

I've launched a pioneering career in DNA education.
And I have a talent for making DNA accessible, exciting, and relevant.

Soon you will see this on full display as I host the upcoming PBS special, Your DNA Secrets Revealed.

I am happy to be here, and I hope you will join me!

https://www.yourdnaguide.com

account.note:
史记：
赵国末年维尼专权，宦官走狗横行，狼狈为奸。
对外谄媚对内专横，打压异己秘密抓捕，
焚书坑儒闭目塞听，操纵言论愚弄大众，
遮掩罪孽粉饰太平，
视万民如刍狗、待百姓以牛羊，
罪大莫及罄竹难书！
下民无知人云亦云，以黑为白认贼作父，
何其哀哉！
是曰：
无耻是卑劣者的通行证，
无脑是鱼肉们的墓志铭。

有诗为证：
万马齐喑究可哀，一窝鼠蚁竞横行。
搬是弄非祸自生，搞风搅雨史留名。
焚书坑儒何足道，闭耳塞嘴愧天恩。
三年灾害四千万，瞠目结舌谢神明。
天不生我长如夜，毛病不改积恶习。
古来草熊逊颜色，抓人禁评显威仪。
满脸喷粪谁任性，通商宽衣我妄为。
寡廉鲜耻立牌坊，倒行逆施新罗衣。
民若有魂魂自哀，才脱苦海苦又来。
韭菜犹能望春归，沦落为羊任割㱰。
病久入深麻不仁，烹酒饮乐今何夕。
长夜难明夜复深，寥若晨星星安在！

----「一本歪经•庚子年清明祭」

content:
I dunno, this seems like a combination of (a) a credible source who was wrong and (b) a miscommunication within AP.

LaPorta took the tip to his editors and told them "a senior manager had already vetted the source of LaPorta’s tip." That was true, the source had been vetted and approved before, and the editors ran the story.

To the extent it really violated AP's standards, it's the editors' fault for not checking with managers about a second source.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/media/2022/11/21/james-laporta-associated-press-poland-russia-missile/
